citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40 pm on
October 16, 2024. After arriving at facility and not finding anyone there, the inspector phoned the licensee. They said they
were out and would not be able to return to complete an inspection at this time.
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:40 pm on 
October 16, 2024. After arriving at facility and not finding anyone there, the inspector phoned the licensee. They said they 
were out and would not be able to return to complete an inspection at this time.  
Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and 
regulations. Failure to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
